meanings.definition: A person or thing that subtracts.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was the subtracter in the classroom, helping students solve math problems.
meanings.sent2: I used a calculator as a subtracter to find out how much money I had left.
meanings.sent3: The clever subtracter squirrel hid nuts in different places to confuse the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp memory acted as a subtracter, always taking away unnecessary details to focus on the main points.
meanings.sent5: The subtracter bee diligently removed one flower petal at a time to build its hive.

meanings.definition: A mathematical operation that finds the difference between two numbers.
meanings.sent1: The subtracter showed us how to find the answer by taking away one number from the other.
meanings.sent2: In math class, we practiced using the subtracter to solve subtraction problems.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf used the subtracter to figure out how many cookies he could sneak without being caught.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with colors that seemed to subtracter from the darkness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The subtracter operation helped us determine how many apples were left after some were eaten.
